description: Manage the Directline Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot directline create
commands.summary: Create the DirectLine Channel on a bot with only v3 protocol enabled.
commands.syntax:
az bot directline create --name
                         --resource-group
                         [--add-disabled {false, true}]
                         [--disablev1 {false, true}]
                         [--disablev3 {false, true}]
                         [--enable-enhanced-auth {false, true}]
                         [--location]
                         [--site-name]
                         [--trusted-origins]
examples: az bot directline create -n botName -g MyResourceGroup --disablev1

commands.name: az bot directline delete
commands.summary: Delete the Directline Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot directline show
commands.summary: Get details of the Directline Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot directline update
commands.summary: Update the DirectLine Channel on a bot with only v3 protocol enabled.
commands.syntax:
az bot directline update --name
                         --resource-group
                         [--add-disabled {false, true}]
                         [--disablev1 {false, true}]
                         [--disablev3 {false, true}]
                         [--enable-enhanced-auth {false, true}]
                         [--site-name]
                         [--trusted-origins]
examples: az bot directline update -n botName -g MyResourceGroup --disablev1
